body_html: At the very least, I find it concerning that running of the initialization op doesn't respond to SIGTERM and only responds to SIGKILL when it's waiting for a queue dependency. What gives there?
body_text: At the very least, I find it concerning that running of the initialization op doesn't respond to SIGTERM and only responds to SIGKILL when it's waiting for a queue dependency. What gives there?
body: At the very least, I find it concerning that running of the initialization op doesn't respond to `SIGTERM` and only responds to `SIGKILL` when it's waiting for a queue dependency. What gives there?
